phenoviewer

Class PlotFormat

  • java.lang.Object
    • phenoviewer.PlotFormat

  • public class PlotFormat
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides a static method getFormatted that returns a double value as a string in decimal or scientific notation.

    • Method Detail

      • getFormatted

        public static java.lang.String getFormatted(double val,
                            double decimal_hi_limit,
                            double decimal_lo_limit,
                            int decimal_places)
        The options include 1 to 3 decimal places. Values below decimalLimit use decimal notation; above this use scientific notation.
        Parameters:
        input - value
        upper - limit before changing to scientific notation
        lower - limit before changing to scientific notation
        number - of decimal places in the output.
